protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-AFFY-3
protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-32099
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana seedlings were grown on MS media for 10 days in dark at 22 degrees C.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-32100
protocol.text: Seedlings were treated by immersion in dimethylsulphoxide (DMSO, control) or BA (1 µM) for either 45 minutes or 120 minutes in dark on shaker

protocol.name: P-MTAB-32101
protocol.text: Qiagen RNA extraction kit was used as per manufacturer's instruction
